title: Suzuki Motorcycle reports 6.3% decline in March sales at 65,495 units
description: Domestic sales stood at 50,734 units as against 60,222 units in March last year. Exports were at 14,761 units in March 2022 as compared to 9,170 units in the year-ago month, the company said in a statement.
